column4: Been trying to get assistance in #deluge for a long time now (several hours). I'm taking my question here. I know this is not directly related to Ubuntu: My download speed is stuck at 0.00? Deluge 1.3.0 from PPA ppa:deluge-team/ppa on Ubuntu 10.04. Port is forwarded, doing a port check gets green check mark.
is anyone seeding?  I use deluge, but didn't mess around with port forwarding or anything just opened it up and it works
There should be at least 40 seeders on one of these.
Tracker reports OK, however health is 0, and it is only finding a very small subset of the actual seeders, and 0 upload from them.
